nodes.text: Favorites of the Force was a sour oval-shaped candy of various colors (red, yellow, green, orange, and blue) and shapes (both small and large) created by secretive confectioners for the Rebel Alliance. It was sold by a Rebel Alliance officer during the Remembrance Day celebrations in Coronet on Corellia in 1 ABY. Its packaging had red, yellow, and green stripes (with red and green being most prominent) and featured the likeness of Jedi Master Yoda.
